title: PC March 26 - Tell us where the insults are - a correspondence
content:
The edition of Saturday March of the Fascist Telematic newspaperCentury of Italygives account- Of course in his own way, through the pen of such Maurizio Ferrini - of what happened during the same day in some Italian squares affected by parades for Palestine; The Pennivendolo - which evidently is permanently equipped with paralters - argues that during the Rome event they heard "insults to the life senator Liliana Segre, to David Parenzo and to the government from part of the left and pro-Palestinian militants during the procession Pro Palestine ».

To demonstrate what he asserts transcribes some passages of the Interventions at the parade: “We have further proof of the immortal Victimism by our dear life senator Liliana Segre - He marked one of the participants - who treats the word to the megaphone genocide as if it were an exclusivity of a few. Blind in front of the Palestinian doctors in Gaza treated by slaughter beasts. Denuded e Trucidati ". Insults also to the journalistDavid Parenzo, defined one of the "cornerstones of Zionism Made in Italy".

We ask, to anyone who is not permanently equipped with blinders, to explain to us - after analyzing without preconceptions how much just repeated - what the insults would be addressed to the nonagenaria Milanese senator; We cannot see any: unless not than we mean the accusations of not wanting to see another holocaust if not that immediately from the Jews but not only from them, in the period of Second World War by the Hitler's hordes with the help of Mussolinian fascists, collaborators and spies ready to denounce the Reprobes for some personal gain.

Bosio (AL), March 25, 2024
